snippet: In “Spillover,” David Quammen writes about how human pandemics stem from animals and thinks about what he calls the NBO’s — the Next Big Ones.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book Spillover: Animal Infections and the Next Human Pandemic by David Quammen.
lead_paragraph: In “Spillover,” David Quammen writes about how human pandemics stem from animals and thinks about what he calls the NBO’s — the Next Big Ones.

headline.seo: ‘Spillover,’ by David Quammen, on How Animals Infect Humans
headline.main: They Are So Beastly, These Ticks and Plagues
headline.print_headline: They Are So Beastly, These Ticks and Plagues
